pages.name: Entry Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/blank_rider_core_id)Blank Rider Core ID$(/l)

pages.title: The End Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_the_end_riders)Desire Driver (The End Riders)$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed

pages.name: Armed Arrow
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/arrow_raise_buckle)Arrow Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: The End Rider
